message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a slight edge, but I still need a fair share. Let's end this.
You're running out of time, the money is losing value for you!
This is my final offer. You're getting more than a fair share, and I'm losing money with every round.  Let's wrap this up.
You're losing a lot of value, I'm being generous by not taking more. Last chance!
